titleStmt.title: The Quaker no Papist, in answer to The Quaker disarm'd. Or, A brief reply and censure of Mr. Thomas Smith's frivolous relation of a dispute held betwixt himself and certain Quakers at Cambridge. By Hen. Denne.
titleStmt.author: Denne, Henry, 1606 or 7-1660?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and are to be sold by Francis Smith, at the signe of the Elephant and Castle without Temple-Bar,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
